Interface Script.Event

All Superinterfaces:
Event
All Known Subinterfaces:
ParserInstance.ScriptActivityChangeEvent, ScriptLoader.ScriptLoadEvent, ScriptLoader.ScriptUnloadEvent

public static interface Script.Event extends Event
Used for listening to events involving a Script.
